description.narrative: The Papua New Guinea (PNG) Basic and Secondary Education Program is currently finalising a new program of long term support. This new support will be delivered through three mechanisms operating at national and sub-national levels. One of these mechanisms will be Capacity Development Facility (CDF) to support the PNG National Department of Education (DoE) and the Provincial Education Departments to fund high priority technical assistance critical for improved service delivery. This will include activities such as training, twinning and workshops as well as the administration of advisors. Funding under this initiative is for the provision of interim technical assistance support in the area of capacity development to the PNG DoE, during the transition period between the existing Education Capacity Development Program (ECBP) and the commencement of the new long term program of support. The total value of this initiative is $0.6 million over 2 years, starting 2010-11.
